archimate:Requirement.name: SM.2.2.10: A process for maintaining contact with authorities (e.g. government agencies, utilities, telecommunication providers, emergency services, and regulatory bodies) should be established, which:
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
